subject: Ron Lederer  . . . Have you had a chance . . .
author: SUZANNE
full_text:
Hi Ron

I sent you several EVP's that were captured using my Franks Box.  I was 
wondering if you had had a chance to listen to them as of yet?  I was 
wondering your thoughts . . . They appear to speak over the ban sweep.  
Let me know what you think, I appreciate any input :-)

Suzanne May
Director
MI Metro Paranormal Society
